title: Best ever cheese straws
ingredients: ['165g butter, at room temperature', '280g grated Cheddar cheese, at room temperature', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '220g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '1 dash hot sauce', 'chilled water as needed']
